radiographic_examinations.findings: Enlargement of the pancreas; indications of bilateral kidney involvement; mass at the bile duct convergence with intrahepatic bile duct dilatation.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Resolution of clinical symptoms and of the pancreatic and renal abnormalities on computed tomography and magnetic resonance imaging during 2 years of rituximab therapy.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Enlargement of the pancreas; diffuse bile duct dilatation; indications of a mass in the hepatic hilum.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Resolution of clinical symptoms and of the pancreatic and renal abnormalities on computed tomography and magnetic resonance imaging during 2 years of rituximab therapy.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Intense tracer uptake in the pelvis, skull, and multiple ribs.
Confirmed pagetic bone at these sites and revealed a dorsal vertebral fracture.
T-scores of -1.1 at the hip and -1.7 at the radius.
